original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya carati. Aññatarāpi bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya carati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu sāvatthiyam aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya carati aññatarā api bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya carati

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—“gaccha, bhagini, amukasmiṁ okāse bhikkhā diyyatī”ti.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu tam bhikkhunim etat avoca gaccha bhagini amukasmin okāse bhikkhā diyyati iti

original: Sāpi kho evamāha—“gacchāyya, amukasmiṁ okāse bhikkhā diyyatī”ti.
analyzed: sā api kho evam āha gaccha ayya amukasmin okāse bhikkhā diyyati iti
te abhiṇha dassanena sandiṭṭhāḥ ahesu

original: Tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa cīvaraṁ bhājīyati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa cīvaram bhājīyati

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī ovādaṁ gantvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī ovādam gantvā yena saḥ bhikkhu tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhum abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho taṁ bhikkhuniṁ so bhikkhu etadavoca—“ ayaṁ me, bhagini, cīvarapaṭivīso; sādiyissasī”ti?
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitam kho tam bhikkhunim saḥ bhikkhu etat avoca ayam me bhagini cīvara paṭivīsaḥ sādiyissasi iti
āmāyya dubbala cīvarāmhi iti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā cīvaram adāsi
saḥ api kho bhikkhu dubbala cīvaraḥ hoti

original: Bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—“karohi dāni te, āvuso, cīvaran”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhū tam bhikkhum etat avocukarohi dāni te āvuso cīvaranti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā cīvaram dassati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā cīvaram adāsi iti
sat ca bhagavān ati
ñātikā te bhikkhu aññātikā ati
aññātikā bhagavā ati

original: “Aññātako, moghapurisa, aññātikāya na jānāti patirūpaṁ vā appatirūpaṁ vā santaṁ vā asantaṁ vā.
analyzed: aññātakaḥ mogha purisa aññātikāya na jānāti patirūpam vā appatirūpam vā santam vā asantam vā

original: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ dassasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva moghapurisa aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaram dassasi

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ dadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā bhikkhunīnaṁ pārivattakaṁ cīvaraṁ na denti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kukkuccāyantāḥ bhikkhunīnam pārivattakam cīvaram na denti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā amhākaṁ pārivattakaṁ cīvaraṁ na dassantī”ti.

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tāsaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ ujjhāyantīnaṁ khiyyantīnaṁ vipācentīnaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tāsam bhikkhunīnam ujjhāyantīnam khiyyantīnam vipācentīnam

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
